animeTitle: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu Ni! Specials
otherNames: Hideyoshi Hideyoshi Magic Special, Baka and Test - Summon the Beasts: Magical Hideyoshi Hideyoshi, バカとテストと召喚獣にっ！ 『魔法秀吉ひでよし』
synopsis:
Spin-off of Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu that has been serialized on Famitsu Comic Clear website since 2010.

These specials are included in the Baka to Test Ni! BD/DVD releases.
